flawed_nl_solution:
One-tenth of the time, no one reappears, so there have been 100 / 10 = <<100/10=10>>10 times no one has reappeared.
One-fifth of the time, two people reappear, so there have been 100 / 5 = <<100/5=20>>20 times 2 people have reappeared.
In those 20 times, 2 * 20 = <<2*20=40>>40 people have reappeared in all.
Thus, there have been 100 - 10 - 20 = <<100-10-20=72>>72 times one person has reappeared.
Therefore, over 100 acts, 72 + 40 = 112 people have reappeared in all.
#### 112

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 72. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
